items.description: Get to know the meta 5-man team composition, learn about the `/gg` command and Mistlock Instabilities.
Learn how to use various consumables to greatly simplify otherwise challenging content.
Learn which skills and traits your profession can use to avoid damaging mechanics.
Use blasts and combo fields to stack large amounts of <Boon name="might"/>, <Boon name="fury"/> and <Effect name="stealth"/> on your party.
